  ✖ A switch case should only have a single statement. If you want more, then wrap it in a block.

    1 │ switch (foo) {
    2 │  case true:
  > 3 │  case false:
      │  ^^^^^^^^^^^
  > 4 │   let foo = '';
  > 5 │   foo;
      │ ^^^^^^
    6 │ }

  ℹ Recommended fix

    1   │ - case false:
      1 │ + case false:·{
    2 2 │     let foo = "";
    3   │ -   foo;
      3 │ +   foo;
      4 │ + }
